TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConnectionProviderAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 識別 Web 組件連接之提供者伺服器控制項的回呼方法，並讓開發人員指定提供者連接點的細節。

span.span: Identifies the callback method in a server control acting as the provider in a Web Parts connection, and enables developers to specify details about the provider's connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件連接中的兩個伺服器控制項所組成區域和共用資料，透過介面執行個體傳遞從一個控制項之間。A Web Parts connection consists of two server controls residing in a zone and sharing data by means of an interface instance passed from one control to the other. 提供的介面執行個體的控制項稱為 「 提供者，並接收的介面執行個體和程序，或顯示資料的控制項稱為取用者。The control that serves the interface instance is called the provider, and the control that receives the interface instance and processes or displays the data is called the consumer. 如需連線的詳細資訊，請參閱類別以及[Web 組件連接概觀](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100))。For details on connections, see the class and [Web Parts Connections Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178187(v=vs.100)). 在連接中的提供者控制項可以成為控制項或任何類型的伺服器或使用者控制項，但它必須指定為回呼方法的方法。The provider control in a connection can be a control or any type of server or user control, but it must have a method designated as a callback method. 在連線過程中，叫用回呼方法，其目的是要傳回給取用者介面執行個體，其中包含資料。The callback method is invoked during the connection process, and its purpose is to return to the consumer an interface instance that contains data. 若要指定做為提供者的回呼方法的方法，您必須新增`ConnectionProviderAttribute`方法的中繼資料元素 (元素根據類別)。To designate the method that serves as the callback method in a provider, you must add a `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element to the method (the element is based on the class). 除了指定的提供者的回呼方法物件也可讓您指定的提供者連接點的相關特定詳細資料。In addition to designating the callback method in a provider, the object also enables you to specify certain details about a provider's connection point. 提供者連接點是的執行個體封裝才能建立連線，包括提供者的控制項型別，是否可連線至多個取用者在此同時，提供者的相關的所有詳細資料的類別內容介面提供者的型別是用來取用者，回呼方法中，並代表使用者介面 (UI) 中的提供者連接點的顯示名稱的相關詳細資料。A provider connection point is an instance of the class that encapsulates all the details about a provider needed to establish a connection, including the provider's control type, whether it can connect to multiple consumers at the same time, what type of interface the provider serves to consumers, details about the callback method, and a display name that represents the provider connection point in the user interface (UI). 每個 Web 組件連接包括與提供者控制項相關聯的提供者連接點。Every Web Parts connection includes a provider connection point that is associated with the provider control. 當您將加入`ConnectionProviderAttribute`回呼方法，在提供者的中繼資料元素，您也可以使用它來指定提供者連接點的下列詳細： 連接點的顯示名稱 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性)，是否提供者可以連線到多個取用者在相同的時間 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 屬性)，連接點的識別碼 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱屬性)，以及提供者 （適用於所使用的連接點的類型詳細資訊，請參閱屬性)。When you add the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element to the callback method in a provider, you can also use it to specify the following details about the provider connection point: a display name for the connection point (for details, see the property), whether the provider can connect to multiple consumers at the same time (for details, see the property), an ID for the connection point (for details, see the property), and the type of the connection point that the provider uses (for details, see the property). 四個多載的建構函式每個類別有參數，讓您指定的一或多個連接點屬性的值，建立類別的新執行個體時。The four overloads of the constructor for the class each have parameters that allow you to specify values for one or more of these connection point properties when a new instance of the class is created. 大部分的提供者連接點的內容，也可以設定以程式設計的方式;設定它們使用`ConnectionProviderAttribute`是選擇性元素。Most of the properties for a provider connection point can also be set programmatically; setting them using the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` element is optional. > [!NOTE] > 當您將加入`ConnectionProviderAttribute`至回呼方法，在提供者的中繼資料元素，您永遠必須指定唯一的必要的參數是`displayName`參數 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱建構函式多載)。When you add the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element to a callback method in a provider, the only required parameter that you must always specify is the `displayName` parameter (for details, see the constructor overload). 此參數的值指派給屬性，以及當使用者在開啟連接 UI (建立控制項)，顯示名稱代表在 UI 中的提供者連接點。The value of this parameter is assigned to the property, and when a user opens the connection UI (created by the control), the display name represents the provider connection point in the UI. 如果您指定多個提供者控制項的回呼方法，您會有多個可能的連接點可供選擇，以及新增`ConnectionProviderAttribute`每個回呼方法的中繼資料元素，您應該指定的值`id`參數，以便每個提供者連接點都有已知的唯一識別碼。If you designate multiple callback methods in a provider control, you will have multiple possible connection points to choose from, and when you add the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element to each callback method, you should also specify a value for the `id` parameter, so that each provider connection point has a known, unique identifier. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，示範如何宣告`ConnectionProviderAttribute`中繼資料提供者控制項的回呼方法上的項目。The following code example demonstrates using the class, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a provider control. 請注意，會使用簡單的多載的建構函式;只有`displayName`提供參數值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowproviderwebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowproviderwebpart.vb#6)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立基本的靜態控制項之間連接兩個 Web 組件使用類別。The following code examples demonstrate how to create a basic, static connection between two Web Parts controls using the class. 提供者和取用者的程式碼檔案應該放入所包含的.aspx 頁面應用程式資料夾下的 [App_Code] 資料夾中。The provider and consumer code files should be put into the App_Code folder under the application folder that contains the .aspx page. 第一個範例示範當做提供者的類別。The first example shows a class acting as a provider. 請注意，方法指定為回呼方法，使用`ConnectionProviderAttribute`中繼資料元素。Notice that a method is designated as the callback method with the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowproviderwebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowproviderwebpart.vb#1)] 第二個範例會示範做為消費者的類別。The second example shows a class acting as a consumer. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowconsumerwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowconsumerwebpart.vb#2)] 最後一個範例會顯示包含兩個控制項的 ASP.NET 網頁。The final example shows the ASP.NET page that contains the two controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/defaultcs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/defaultvb.aspx#3)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

related.span: 保護 Web 組件頁面

span.span: Securing Web Parts Pages
Web Parts Connections Overview

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，指定要用於連接點顯示名稱的值，以及選擇性地指定要用於連接點的 ID、連接點類型或這兩者的值。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a value to use for the connection point display name, and optionally specifying values to use for the connection point's ID, the connection point type, or both.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供者控制項可以有多個方法，以標示`ConnectionProviderAttribute`中繼資料元素。A provider control can have multiple methods marked with the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element. 在此情況下，提供者會有多個連接點和每個執行個體`ConnectionProviderAttribute`項目應該指定相關聯的連接點，唯一的識別碼值，以便可以區別提供者的連接點。In this case, the provider would have multiple connection points, and each instance of the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` element should specify a unique ID value for the associated connection point, so that the provider's connection points can be distinguished.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string displayName) cil managed

param.name: displayName
param.span: 字串，包含要在使用者介面 (UI) 中顯示的提供者接點易記名稱。

span.span: A string that contains a friendly name for the provider connection point to display in the user interface (UI).

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定提供者連接點的顯示名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name for the provider connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立屬性做為提供者 Web 組件控制項的方法搭配使用的執行個體。This constructor creates an instance of the attribute that is used with a method of a Web Parts control acting as a provider. 這個方法會變成的提供者和取用者之間的連接點。This method becomes the connection point between the provider and the consumer. 一般而言，您使用這個建構函式的方式是將宣告`ConnectionProviderAttribute`您想要指定為提供者控制項的回呼方法的方法上的中繼資料元素。Typically, the way you use this constructor is to declare a `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element on a method that you want to designate as a callback method in a provider control. `displayName`參數是由提供者連接點的易記名稱控制項以代表在 UI 中的提供者的連接點。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the provider connection point that is used by the control to represent a provider's connection point in the UI. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別，示範如何宣告`ConnectionProviderAttribute`中繼資料提供者控制項的回呼方法上的項目。The following code example demonstrates using the class, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a provider control. 請注意，會使用簡單的多載的建構函式;只有`displayName`提供參數值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. 若要執行的程式碼範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code required to run the code example, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowproviderwebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowproviderwebpart.vb#6)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定提供者連接點的顯示名稱和 ID。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name and an ID for the provider connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`參數是由提供者連接點的易記名稱控制項以代表在 UI 中的提供者的連接點。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the provider connection point that is used by the control to represent a provider's connection point in the UI. `id`參數用來指定特定的回呼方法與相關聯的提供者連接點的識別碼。The `id` parameter is used to specify the ID for the provider connection point associated with the specific callback method. 控制項可以有多個連接點，但`id`每個必須是唯一。A control can have multiple connection points, but the `id` for each must be unique. 因此，這個多載的建構函式是如果您有多個回呼方法，在您的提供者控制。Therefore, this overload of the constructor is useful if you have multiple callback methods in your provider control.

span.span: or is .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定要用於提供者連接點的顯示名稱和連接點物件的特定型別。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name and a specific type of connection point object to use for the provider connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`參數是由提供者連接點的易記名稱控制項以代表在 UI 中的提供者的連接點。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the provider connection point that is used by the control to represent a provider's connection point in the UI. `connectionPointType`參數必須是衍生自。The `connectionPointType` parameter must be a derived from . 如果指定這個參數，則用來建立連接點，而不是標準Web 組件控制集所提供的類別。If this parameter is specified, the is used to create the connection point instead of the standard class provided with the Web Parts control set.

is not valid.

summary.span: 將 類別的新執行個體初始化，指定要用於提供者連接點的顯示名稱、識別碼和特定類型的連接點物件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying a display name, an ID, and a specific type of connection point object to use for the provider connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`參數是由提供者連接點的易記名稱控制項以代表在 UI 中的提供者的連接點。The `displayName` parameter is a friendly name of the provider connection point that is used by the control to represent a provider's connection point in the UI. `id`參數用來指定特定的回呼方法與相關聯的提供者連接點的識別碼。The `id` parameter is used to specify the ID for the provider connection point associated with the specific callback method. 控制項可以有多個連接點，但`id`每個必須是唯一。A control can have multiple connection points, but the `id` for each must be unique. 因此，這個多載的建構函式是如果您有多個回呼方法，在您的提供者控制。Therefore, this overload of the constructor is useful if you have multiple callback methods in your provider control. `connectionPointType`參數必須是衍生自。The `connectionPointType` parameter must be a derived from . 如果指定這個參數，則用來建立連接點，而不是標準Web 組件控制集所提供的類別。If this parameter is specified, the is used to create the connection point instead of the standard class provided with the Web Parts control set.

span.span: , , or is .
is not valid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowsMultipleConnections { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AllowsMultipleConnections : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出連接點是否允許多個連接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the connection point allows multiple connections.

value.span: 如果連接點接受多個連線;否則， 。

span.span: if the connection point accepts multiple connections; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供者連接點可以連線到多個取用者，根據預設，與此屬性上的屬性設為`true`。Provider connection points can connect to multiple consumers by default, and this property on the attribute is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ConnectionPointType As Type
public: property Type ^ ConnectionPointType { Type ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與提供者控制項關聯的連接點型別。

span.span: Gets the type of the connection point associated with a provider control.
A that indicates the type of the connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回的提供者連接點。This property returns the of the provider connection point. 必須衍生自，以及當您宣告`connectionPointType`參數搭配`ConnectionProviderAttribute`回呼方法，您將宣告型別的執行個體上的中繼資料元素用來建立連接點，而不是標準類別。The must derive from , and when you declare the `connectionPointType` parameter with a `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element on a callback method, an instance of the type you declare is used to create a connection point instead of the standard class.

exception.span: 使用無效的連接點型別 (不是衍生自 類別)。

span.span: An invalid connection point type (one that does not derive from the class) was used.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property DisplayName As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得提供者連接點的易記名稱。

span.span: Gets the friendly name of the provider connection point.

value.span: 字串，包含提供者連接點的易記顯示名稱。

span.span: A string containing a friendly display name for the provider connection point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是提供者連接點的易記名稱。This property is the friendly name of a provider connection point. 當您將其值也可以宣告方式，設定`displayName`參數來`ConnectionProviderAttribute`回呼方法的中繼資料元素。Its value can be set declaratively, when you add the `displayName` parameter to a `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element on a callback method. 它也可以設定以程式設計方式由衍生類別中，使用 受保護屬性。It can also be set programmatically by a derived class, by using the protected property. 當您要搜尋透過連接點集合時，您應該使用屬性，因為 ID 屬性必須是唯一的但屬性不需要。When you are searching through a connection point collection, you should use the property, because the ID property must be unique, but the property need not be. 屬性的提供者連接點會顯示給使用者時控制項是在頁面上，連接使用者介面 (UI) 是開啟時，在使用者可以的檢視他們可以選擇建立的連接點連接。The property of a provider connection point is displayed to users when a control is on the page, the connection user interface (UI) is open, and the users are in a view where they are allowed to select connection points to establish a connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，藉由示範如何宣告`ConnectionProviderAttribute`中繼資料提供者控制項的回呼方法上的項目。The following code example demonstrates using the property, by showing how to declare the `ConnectionProviderAttribute` metadata element on a callback method in a provider control. 請注意，會使用簡單的多載的建構函式;只有`displayName`提供參數值。Note that the simplest overload of the constructor is used; only the `displayName` parameter value is supplied. 參數的值會變成值屬性。The value of the parameter will become the value of the property. 若要執行的程式碼範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱類別概觀。For the full code required to run the code example, see the class overview. [!code-csharp[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/CS/rowproviderwebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UI.WebControls.WebParts.Connection/VB/rowproviderwebpart.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property System::String ^ DisplayNameValue { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DisplayNameValue : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定字串，適用於當地語系化案例中做為 屬性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used as the value of the property, for use in localization scenarios.
A string that is used as the value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個額外的屬性存在，因此您可以衍生自，並提供當地語系化的版本。This extra property exists so that you can derive from and provide a localized version. 衍生可當地語系化屬性將維護的布林值的私用欄位，指出是否已當地語系化。The derived localizable attribute will maintain a private Boolean field to indicate whether it has been localized. 在第一次存取屬性，它會查詢當地語系化字串，並接著使用屬性將當地語系化的值指派給屬性。On the first access to the property, it will look up the localized string, and then use the property to assign the localized value to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ID As String
public: property System::String ^ ID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，表示提供者連接點物件的唯一識別。

span.span: Gets a string that represents the unique identity of the provider connection point object.

value.span: 指定給提供者連接點的唯一 ID。

span.span: The unique ID assigned to the provider connection point.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果正在搜尋連線點集合，您應該使用找不到特定的連接點的屬性。If searching through a connection point collection, you should use the property to locate a particular connection point. 這個屬性可用來區別具有相同名稱的兩個連接點。This property can be used to distinguish between two connection points of the same name. 提供者連接點可以具有相同屬性值，但屬性必須不同。Provider connection points can have the same property value, but the property must be different.
